data.title: Habitat for Humanity GTA
data.meta_description: Building a better GTA for everyone. We build affordable, inclusive communities across the Greater Toronto Area.
data.text:
UNLOCK THE BENEFITS OF A HOME OF YOUR OWN

At Habitat for Humanity GTA, we build quality, affordable homes, empowering families to reach their full potential, enabling multi-generational success and creating stronger more equitable communities.

Owning a home with Habitat for Humanity GTA removes the barriers of traditional home-buying. There's no need to spend decades saving for a down paymentâ€”our homes don't require one. Families benefit from an affordable mortgage structured to their income, with a secondary mortgage provided by us to make up the difference. This ensures that initially, no family will allocate more than 32% of their income towards housing costs, allowing them to save, invest in education, and plan for the future with greater peace of mind.

We offer a variety of quality condominiums and stacked townhomes in Toronto, Brampton, Caledon, Durham Region, Toronto & York Region for families, couples, and individuals.
